channel.title: Ysvalon - Simply unique, in every aspect
channel.description:
[center][IMG]http://i60.tinypic.com/15d506h.png[/img][/center]
[hr] [i][b]Notes:[/b][/i] - The project will be hoested in a pre-alpha stage once we feel contempt with the server - If you have any feedback/suggestions feel free to post.
[hr] The development team consists of three developers and a community management team which will manage the community when the server is release for public use.
[i][b]Development -[/b][/i] [i] [ul][li]- SJ[/li][/ul]
[ul][li]- Daginith[/li][/ul]
[ul][li]- [/li][/ul]
[b]Client developer -[/b]
[ul][li]- [/li][/ul]
[i][b]Community Management -[/b][/i]
[ul][li]- Soulcist[/li][/ul]
[hr] [i][b]Introduction:[/b][/i] Ysvalon is simply a unique server, the server will consist of many new and unique events, cycles, and most likely unseen content in a private server. Ysvalon will have no weapons or armor above runite, magika will also be an integral part of the server however it's not going to be 'you're in the jungle, a bear attack you bind it and run away' Ysvalon will utilize a survival spell book for instance, Ysvalon will have a system during the night cycle the 'temperature' will drop, if you're walking/running through the world to another city, during that time you are prone to hypothermia the spellbook will contain an 'ignite fire' spell, if you have a log/plank in your inventory you will be able to light a fire without a formal tinderbox. Anyway, no more spoiling! ;) [hr] [i][b]Headway for Development:[/b][/i] Uncomplete - Red In progress - Orange Complete - Green
[b]Content:[/b] [size=8pt]Survival magika spells[/size] [size=8pt]Enlist/delist option to join a factions army under oath to the current King/ruler[/size] [size=8pt]Factions system[/size] [size=8pt]Day/night cycle system - Need to tweak cycle times, currently it changes every 60 seconds[/size] [size=8pt]Bonfires[/size] [size=8pt]King/Queen/Ruler system[/size] [size=8pt]Armory/war system[/size] [size=8pt]Add music/sound system[/size] [s][size=8pt]Python scripting system[/size][/s]
[b]Skills:[/b] Uncomplete - Red In progress - Orange Complete - Green
[s][size=8pt]Prayer[/size][/s] [s][size=8pt]Fishing[/size][/s] [s][size=8pt]Firemaking[/size][/s] [s][size=8pt]Fletching[/size][/s] [s][size=8pt]Crafting[/size][/s] [hr] [b]Media:[/b] [img]http://i.imgur.com/0I16RCI.png[/img] [img]http://i.imgur.com/VJtdHaN.png[/img] [hr]
[code] Updates: 02/03/14 - Based the system off blakeman's old one. Kept core components and redid everything to dfit this server. Everything now saves and reads .dat files 02/03/14 - Fixed a few bugs related to the new system player saving system. (i.e.) wasn't returning a value when the password is wrong, causing the server to allow any password. And a few other things. Seems to be working fine now. 02/03/14 - Cleaned up some useless code, doc'd code 02/02/14 - changed a few things in RS2LoginProtocalDecoder to allow for the new login system. 03/02/14 - Redid the player save system, now in binary. (*.dat) 03/02/14 - Fixed login issues with new player saving system. 03/02/14 - Several changes in RS2LoginProtocolDecoder class to allow for the new player saving system 03/02/14 - Made it so you can't have a blank password/username, or a taken username. 03/02/12 - Fixed some client return messages. 03/02/14 - Wrote an XStream parser for npc spawning/npc drops 03/02/14 - Wrote a new commands class - can't handled shit crammed into a single class 04/02/14 - wrote jdbc connector 04/02/14 - fixed a deadlock in the playersaving class 05/02/14 - Added day/night cycling - need to tweak code, cycles are updated via time passed as a parameter 05/02/14 - Finished python scripting system 05/02/14 - wrote a new players rights system to go along with the new saving system - unimplemented[/code]

item.title: Ysvalon - Simply unique, in every aspect

item.title: Ysvalon - Simply unique, in every aspect
item.dc:creator: @Scape-JAVA Scape-JAVA
item.description:
@Scape-JAVA wrote:

Pure_:

Is this still going on? Updates please!

Not dead, but slow progress as of late. Been rather busy, but I’ll update you guys soon! Going to do some development tonight (hopefully).

xEthanx:

Pretty interesting ideas. Are you only going to be adding the features and 5 skills you’ve listed though? People can only play those for so long. I’d like to see more updates on this as well.

Every skill will be implemented.

Read full topic
item.source: Ysvalon - Simply unique, in every aspect

item.dc:creator: @Daginith Daginith
item.description:
@Daginith wrote:

Docent:

Uh put the darkness overlay, it looks more like night

I have full intentions of making the darkness, more like night. At the current stage, its more of a place holder. Just to show an idea of it.

Read full topic

item.title: Ysvalon - Simply unique, in every aspect
item.dc:creator: @Scape-JAVA Scape-JAVA
item.description:
@Scape-JAVA wrote:

[center][/center]

[hr]
Notes:

  • The project will be hoested in a pre-alpha stage once we feel contempt with the server
  • If you have any feedback/suggestions feel free to post.

[hr]
The development team consists of three developers and a community management team which will manage the community when the server is release for public use.

Development -
[i]
[ul][li]- SJ[/li][/ul]

[ul][li]- Daginith[/li][/ul]

[ul][li]- [/li][/ul]

Client developer -

[ul][li]- [/li][/ul]

Community Management -

[ul][li]- Soulcist[/li][/ul]

[hr]
Introduction:
Ysvalon is simply a unique server, the server will consist of many new and unique events, cycles, and most likely unseen content in a private server. Ysvalon will have no weapons or armor above runite, magika will also be an integral part of the server however it’s not going to be ‘you’re in the jungle, a bear attack you bind it and run away’ Ysvalon will utilize a survival spell book for instance, Ysvalon will have a system during the night cycle the ‘temperature’ will drop, if you’re walking/running through the world to another city, during that time you are prone to hypothermia the spellbook will contain an ‘ignite fire’ spell, if you have a log/plank in your inventory you will be able to light a fire without a formal tinderbox. Anyway, no more spoiling!
[hr]
Headway for Development:
Uncomplete - Red
In progress - Orange
Complete - Green

Content:
[size=8pt]Survival magika spells[/size]
[size=8pt]Enlist/delist option to join a factions army under oath to the current King/ruler[/size]
[size=8pt]Factions system[/size]
[size=8pt]Day/night cycle system - Need to tweak cycle times, currently it changes every 60 seconds[/size]
[size=8pt]Bonfires[/size]
[size=8pt]King/Queen/Ruler system[/size]
[size=8pt]Armory/war system[/size]
[size=8pt]Add music/sound system[/size]
[size=8pt]Python scripting system[/size]

Skills:
Uncomplete - Red
In progress - Orange
Complete - Green

[size=8pt]Prayer[/size]
[size=8pt]Fishing[/size]
[size=8pt]Firemaking[/size]
[size=8pt]Fletching[/size]
[size=8pt]Crafting[/size]
[hr]
Media:


[hr]

Updates: 02/03/14 - Based the system off blakeman's old one. Kept core components and redid everything to dfit this server. Everything now saves and reads .dat files 02/03/14 - Fixed a few bugs related to the new system player saving system. (i.e.) wasn't returning a value when the password is wrong, causing the server to allow any password. And a few other things. Seems to be working fine now. 02/03/14 - Cleaned up some useless code, doc'd code 02/02/14 - changed a few things in RS2LoginProtocalDecoder to allow for the new login system. 03/02/14 - Redid the player save system, now in binary. (*.dat) 03/02/14 - Fixed login issues with new player saving system. 03/02/14 - Several changes in RS2LoginProtocolDecoder class to allow for the new player saving system 03/02/14 - Made it so you can't have a blank password/username, or a taken username. 03/02/12 - Fixed some client return messages. 03/02/14 - Wrote an XStream parser for npc spawning/npc drops 03/02/14 - Wrote a new commands class - can't handled shit crammed into a single class 04/02/14 - wrote jdbc connector 04/02/14 - fixed a deadlock in the playersaving class 05/02/14 - Added day/night cycling - need to tweak code, cycles are updated via time passed as a parameter 05/02/14 - Finished python scripting system 05/02/14 - wrote a new players rights system to go along with the new saving system - unimplemented

Read full topic
